name: Noorio
0:
”Alexa, show me the front door.”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Noorio Skill, you can activate your cameras and watch live videos by saying Alexa voice commands.

To get started, follow the below steps:
1. Download the "Noorio" app from App Store or Google Play Store.
2. Register a Noorio Account with the Noorio app and set up Noorio cameras with the app.
3. Search "Noorio" Skill on the Alexa app. Then enable it and link your Noorio account with your Alexa account.
4. Now you are ready to go.

Example commands to control your Noorio devices:
- "Alexa, show me the <name of the device>."
- "Alexa, show me the front door."
- "Alexa, stop."

Supported Noorio devices:
- Noorio Cam B200
- Noorio Cam B210
- Noorio Cam B211
- Noorio Cam B310
- Noorio Cam B311

If you have any problems, feel free to contact us via support@nooriolife.com.
